definition: to take one's fancy/to be to one's liking
after one's heart (idiom); gratifying and satisfactory/everything one could wish
sweetheart/one's true love/the person of one's thoughts
heartbeat/heart rate/(fig.) emotionally affected/aroused (of desire, emotion, interest etc)
to yearn for sth even in one's dreams (idiom)/to long for sth day and night
